bs-uemodulepdf-desc: Enables MediaWiki to export pages into PDF format
bs-uemodulepdf-overview-desc: Exports pages (special pages and content pages) to PDF.
soap-service-url-not-valid: The URL to the PDF generating web service is not valid. Please check the wiki configuration.
soap-service-url-not-set: The URL to the PDF generating web service is not set. Please check the wiki configuration.
bs-uemodulepdf-widgetlink-subpages-title: Export this page and all subpages as PDF.
action-uemodulepdfsubpages-export: exporting a page, including all sub pages, to PDF
right-uemodulepdfsubpages-export: Export a page, including all sub pages, to PDF
bs-uemodulepdf-widgetlink-recursive-titl: Export this page and all linked pages as PDF.
right-uemodulepdfrecursive-export: Export a page, including all linked pages, to PDF
action-uemodulepdfrecursive-export: export a page, including all linked pages, to PDF
bs-uemodulepdf-pref-suppressns-help: The namespace of the page is omitted from the PDF title.
